## ThirdwebSDK.getApps() method

Call this to get the current apps.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getApps(address?: string): Promise<IAppModule[]>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[IAppModule](./sdk.iappmodule.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;
